mapper.sql: id, user_id, state, parent_id, create_time, modify_time, agent_level, identity_card, identity_card_image, available_amount,agent_piont,province_code,city_code, county_code, agent_level, agent_piont
id, stat_date, create_time, modify_time, user_id, user_phone, user_nickname, recommend_agent_level, recommend_id, recommend_phone, recommend_nickname, commission_amount, settlement_state

DATE_FORMAT(stat_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as stat_date, user_id, user_phone, user_nickname, CASE when recommend_agent_level = 2 then '区县代理商' when recommend_agent_level = 3 then '中心代理商' else '星级代理商' end as recommend_agent_level, recommend_id, recommend_phone, recommend_nickname, IFNULL(commission_amount,0)/100 as commission_amount, case when settlement_state = 1 then '已结算' else '未结算' end as settlement_state

h.income_date, h.income_user_id, CAST((h.seven) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) starAgentIncome, CAST(h.six AS DECIMAL(10,3)) centreAgentIncome, CAST((h.five) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) countyAgentIncome, CAST((h.five + h.six + h.seven) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) promotionAgentIncome

income_date, income_user_id, sum(case income_type when 5 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 five, sum(case income_type when 6 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 six, sum(case income_type when 7 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 seven

h.income_date, h.income_user_id, h.agent_level, CAST((h.one + h.two + h.three) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) businessTotallIncome, CAST(h.one AS DECIMAL(10,3)) oneLevelBusinessIncome, CAST(h.two AS DECIMAL(10,3)) twoLevelBusinessIncome, CAST(h.three AS DECIMAL(10,3)) threeLevelBusinessIncome, CAST(h.four AS DECIMAL(10,3)) areaIncome, CAST((h.one + h.two + h.three + h.four) AS DECIMAL(10,3)) totalIncome

income_date, income_user_id, CASE when agent_level = 2 then '区县代理商' when agent_level = 3 then '中心代理商' else '星级代理商' end as agent_level, sum(case income_type when 1 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 one, sum(case income_type when 2 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 two, sum(case income_type when 3 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 three, sum(case income_type when 4 then IFNULL(income_amount,0) ELSE 0 end)/100 four
mapper.insert: insert into user_agent (id, user_id, state, parent_id, create_time, modify_time, agent_level, identity_card, identity_card_image, available_amount,agent_piont) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{availableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{agentPiont,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into user_agent
id,
user_id,
state,
parent_id,
create_time,
modify_time,
agent_level,
identity_card,
identity_card_image,
available_amount,
agent_piont,
province_code,
city_code,
county_code,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{agentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{identityCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{availableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{agentPiont,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
update user_agent
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
agent_level = #{agentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
identity_card = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card_image = #{identityCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
available_amount = #{availableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_piont = #{agentPiont,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_agent set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agent_level = #{agentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, identity_card = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_card_image = #{identityCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available_amount = #{availableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_piont = #{agentPiont,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

user_id,

recommend_id,
recommend_phone,
recommend_nickname,

mapper.update:
update moumou.agent_commission_income
settlement_state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into area_business_statistics
id,
stat_date,
user_id,
advert_count,
county_code,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{statDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{advertCount,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT(new_user_id)) from user_invite where user_id = #{incomeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE}

select count(DISTINCT(h.new_user_id)) from ( select b.new_user_id from ( select new_user_id from user_invite b where user_id = #{incomeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) a, user_invite b where a.new_user_id = b.user_id and DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE} ) d , user_invite h where d.new_user_id = h.user_id and DATE_FORMAT(h.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE}
select b.area from user_agent a, hat_area b where a.county_code = b.areaID and a.user_id = #{incomeUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
